items.name: bluetooth mouse
items.description: This USB LED wireless mouse has a built-in rechargeable 500mA battery that if fully charged it can be used for about 3 weeks

items.name: nexus air conditioner
items.description: The Nexus 1HP Split Air Conditioner has a durable design it is very efficient and reliable too lt also comes in an elegant and compact design The amazing split unit AC operates quietly and it gets the room cool and fresh almost immediately you switch it on It delivers top performance at all times due to its high efficiency internal lead copper pipe

items.name: oraimo freepods
items.description: With an oraimo exclusive chip FreePods Lite is small in size but has a long playtime Now you can enjoy up to 40 hours of uninterrupted music

items.name: biore uv spf
items.description: This thirst-quenching watery essence intensely moisturizes all skin types and floods parched cells with long-lasting hydration while granting skin water and sweat-resistant SPF 50 sun protection

items.name: silicone phone case
items.description: The iPhone silicone case has a premium build that ensures it lasts for a long time This iPhone case looks attractive in its black silicon color finish The iPhone Silicone Case gives your mobile handset a stylish look and protects it from unwanted damage

items.name: binatone rechargeable standing fan
items.description: Create a welcoming ambiance at home and at work with the Binatone range of premium fans all available at pocket-friendly prices

items.name: johnny walker gin
items.description: Johnnie Walker Gold Label Reserve  Premium Blended Scotch WhiskyJohnnie Walker Gold Label Reserve is an ode to celebration a personal creation of master blender Jim Beveridge to share unforgettable nights with special friends

items.name: nivea body lotion
items.description: Nivea nourishing cocoa body lotion provides 48h nourishing deep moisture care and noticeably smoother skin The patented formula is using the knowledge that our skin contains sufficient moisture in its deeper layers

items.name: oraimo 15000mAh powerbank
items.description: dual output with oraimo AniFast technology fu el two devices quickly at the same time-without sacrificing charging speed

items.name: HAN RIVER electric blender
items.description: this ultra modern blender operates in 2 speed pulse modes and comes with a 1L capacity food grade plastic texture and is drop resistant

items.name: mobile selfie ring
items.description: trendy selfie ring light no need for phone flashlight it's led light is brighter and can serve as flashlight in the dark it has a usb cord for recharging and can be taken anywhere its portable and reliable

items.name: dr teal sugar body scrub
items.description: citrus essential oil helps uplift your mood while vitamin C shea butter orange oil and coconut oil leave the skin moisturized and glowing

items.name: oraimo earpiece
items.description: comfortable eartips plug type 3mm

items.name: 2 in one sandwich and waffle maker
items.description: it has a safety latch that ensures the toaster stays closed when in use.

items.name: jameson irish whiskey
items.description: great whiskey starts with the water and Jamesons life source is the Dungourney River which flows through the Midleton distillery and plays a vital role in the production process

items.name: johnson & johnson clean & clear blackhead clearing daily scrub 150ml
items.description: the special exfoliating micro beads immediately peel away dead cells to unclog pores
